resources.string: Very special city with beautiful people, beautiful places and gastronomy

Three cups of red freshly prepared, The four punches of Gogo, a hammock, two armchairs and three people on the second floor where the art of wood that comes with its own each wonder to the life-giving breath. This was the enabling environment and ingredients necessary to give rise to one of the most beautiful, quiet and cozy bars of Ibague, "VINOTINTO COFFEE-BAR".
Address Carrera 3 No. 7-39 - La Pola Ibagué CO Tel 310-317-1635 Contact: contacto@vinoytinto.com Web site http://www.vinoytinto.com/

Centennial Park, in the center of Ibague, is an ideal place to clear your mind space. So here come the dozens of people morning jogging and walking under the shadows of the Ocobos. In the park is the band shell Garzón and Collazos, named in honor of the famous musicians Dario Eduardo Garzón and Collazos, who formed a well-known musical duo in Colombia.
Open daily to the public. Cl. 10 between cra. 5 and 7.

In this capital conservatories are music as the Institution of Pulecio Melendro Amina, who is named after its founder, who in 1959 opened a music school for the formation of great musicians with human qualities. In 2009, with Chancellor specialist Ibeth Lucia Barrera Castro, this institution called the Conservatory of Ibague, thanks to the excellent academic musical training project and interpreters plus strings, winds and percussion symphony, presented to the entire community ibaguereña.
Carrera 1 calle 9 No. 1-18 Ibagué - Tolima - Colombia +57 8 2618526 +57 8 2639139 http://www.conservatoriodeltolima.edu.co
The light source is activated by the music, a large area of concerts, four sculptures on a human scale in iron, are part of the attractions of the Music Park.

His name is Immaculate Conception Cathedral. earlier 1926 he began his work. A Church as four ships. Monsignor Rodriguez owes this temple Romanesque columns and capitals, arch, beautifully ornamented vaults and rosettes high decorative effect

The Botanical Garden San Jorge has extensive experience in management processes and management of urban trees. As a corporation, we have the knowledge and great experience in the construction of gardens, we offer forestry, environmental and landscape consultants with a host of references certified successfully executed in Tolima territory. The San Jorge, corporation becomes also responsible for the processes and activities of gardening, nursery, propagation and maintenance of living collections, using clean technologies in nutrition, management and control of pests. By experience and commitment to the environment, the Botanical Garden San Jorge extends its range of services
Address: Vía Calambeo Antigua Granja San Jorge :: Tel: +57(8) 263 8334 ::Mail: info@jardinbotanicosanjorge.org

The city of Ibague in 2015 has 553,524 inhabitants (Projection DANE 2015) and ranks eighth nationally in population after Bogota, Medellin, Cali, Barranquilla, Cartagena, Cucuta and Soledad, see: List of Cities Colombia by population (DANE Census, estimated June 2011) and by extension ,, shares sixth place among the largest cities in the country with Cucuta, possessing similarities in the length of the town with the city. The growth rate Demographic highest between 1951 and 1964. The population of urban centers Tolima went from eoría: in 1951 to be 51.3 percent in 1973. In the area Poverty and inequality between 2002 and 2009, step of having the 40.18% to 31.57 percent and extreme poverty fell from 10.55 to 7.20 percent; 63 percent of the population belongs Ibague at levels 1 and 2, the 26 percent stratum 3 and only 11 percent to the upper strata, thus registering to Ibague is the fourth city in the country with less poverty according to DANE. %

Jhonny Ocampo is currently eighth semester student of electonica engineering from the University of Antioquia. Born in Aranzazu-Caldas in 1988. He serves on mobile programaión since August 2015.
